name: Synth City
description:
Synth City, where life begins once the sun sets and dreams come alive. Perfect place to unwind in the city's high-density nightlife.

But even before you have time to enjoy your first beer, people are coming after you. Why ? Who knows ? More importantly, will you be able to come out of this nightmare alive and have the cold beer you are thirsting for? Good luck.

Controls:

- WASD to move 

- Mouse to direct the shot

- Left click to use your default weapon

- Right click to use your special weapon

Tip: The glowing sticks you collect from your enemies can be spent in stores that you can visit during the game. Health and special weapons can be purchased there.

This game was created by the Three Stars Games team during the LvlUp Game Jam 2021.

We chose to add the Retro constraint and aimed at it with a synth / neon style.

Members of the team:

Frédéric Cottier / Programmer

Jean-Yves Schäl / 3D Artist

Jeremy Styles / 3D Artist

Pierrick Oggier (Mane In Green) / Composer and Musician

Samuel Styles / Programmer
